paper_abstract: Existing bounds on theminimum weight d(perpendicular to) of the dual 7-ary code of a projective plane of order 49 show that this must be in the range 76 <= d(perpendicular to) <= 98. We use combinatorial arguments to improve this range to 88 <= d(perpendicular to) <= 98, noting that the upper bound can be taken to be 91 if the plane has a Baer subplane, as in the desarguesian case. A brief survey of known results for the minimum weight of the dual codes of finite projective planes is also included.
paper_title: A lower bound for the minimum weight of the dual 7-ary code of a projective plane of order 49
